definition: drop of height in waterway/staircase of waterfalls
to fall/to tumble/to trip/(of prices etc) to drop/Taiwan pr. [die2]
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: In the Mogul garden, the chadhar idealizes the mountain and its stream.
sentences.chinese: 在莫臥兒人的花園中，跌水使山川和溪流變得更迷人。

sentences.english: Never enter a III. crowded drop or eddy when no room for you exists.
sentences.chinese: 絕不進入沒有空間讓你離開的擁擠的跌水和漩渦中。

sentences.english: Fallingwater is a world-famous masterpiece of the American architect Frank Lloyd Wright.
sentences.chinese: 跌水別墅是美國建築師賴特的著名作品。

sentences.english: If it is made of water revetment, I personally to recognize the moire stone more wins a chip.
sentences.chinese: 如果是製作跌水駁岸，我個人爲認龜紋石更勝一籌。

definition: a low stone wall built along the water's edge to protect an embankment/revetment
